trans-unit.source: An argument of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um argumento do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle navigation events in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará eventos de navegação em um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventHandler> class represents the method that handles the navigation events <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonClick>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.PreviousButtonClick>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonClick> for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control and for controls that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventHandler> classe representa o método que trata os eventos de navegação <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonClick>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.PreviousButtonClick>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonClick> para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> controlar e para controles que herdam o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> controle (como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> controle).

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
